TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientMessageInspector

Docs.summary: Defines a message inspector object that can be added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.MessageInspectors%2A> collection to view or modify messages.

Docs.summary: Enables inspection or modification of a message after a reply message is received but prior to passing it back to the client application.

Docs.summary: Enables inspection or modification of a message before a request message is sent to a service.
